title: Mutiara Kisaran Stadium
text:
Mutiara Kisaran Stadium is a <a href="multi-purpose%20stadium">multi-purpose stadium</a> in the town of <a href="Kisaran">Kisaran</a>, <a href="Indonesia">Indonesia</a>. It is currently used mostly for <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> matches. The stadium has a capacity of 10,000 people.
It is the home base of <a href="PSSA%20Asahan">PSSA Asahan</a> and <a href="PS%20Bintang%20Jaya%20Asahan">PS Bintang Jaya Asahan</a>.
